name: Slimey Platformer
description:
Slimey Platform - my first noob game

Hi everyone :) As mentioned, this is my first game other than pong and Dodge The Creeps by Godot tutorial, therefore I don't expect it to be polished or anything, but I do think it might be entertaining for a few minutes!

Your goal is to collect coins in time limit (60s), you are starting at 5 coins needed and every round you complete, coins needed go up by one. Coins are randomly generated somewhere inside level, so you have to jump through the level to get them.

Movement controls: arrows left/right, spacebar for jump, left mouse button for menu clicking

Most of the game assets are done by me, non-designer, who is very proud of my shaky and blurry art, and background is done by Sam.

Thank you and enjoy the game!
